author: andschwa
body: This is why #1019 failed, so I added an FAQ :smile: --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1028)

comments.author: vors
comments.body: I had the same problem on AppVeyor with `priv_key` secure variable. I just turn a switch "Decrypt secure variables on PRs" to enable it. Can we do the same for Travis CI? I don't see any elevation of privileges with it (if token has the minimal set of permissions).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I looked and could not find a way.

title: Add FAQ about Travis CI failures from forks
